original_title: Sri Lankan rupee falls slightly against USD
original_body_lines: On the heels of the Sri Lankan Rupee dropping below Rs 290 yesterday, it slightly depreciated today, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL).
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD is Rs. 290.67 while the selling rate is Rs. 303.95.
The buying rate stood at 289.89 yesterday while the selling rate has remained unchanged.
